// start with the basic program defined in Gleam
#include "$GLEAMROOT/src/basicOptions.txt"

// this would run the GUI
//#include "$GLEAMROOT/src/guiOptions.txt"

//
// The next three lines allow one to read a previously generated file
//Generator.Members = {} ;                      // turn off generation
//Digitization.Members = {"digiRootReaderAlg"}; // replace digi algs.
//digiRootReaderAlg.digiRootFile="/nfs/farm/g/glast/u06/richard/WBA/AllGamma/IndividualRuns/digi_0000.root";


//
// this would write an ntuple
//
/// JJ: Commented this line out when build could not find the required shareable
///
// 
//#include "$EBFWRITERROOT/src/test/ntuple.txt"

// If you want mc, digi, and recon full ROOT files written
// Comment out the following line
Output.Members = {};



// append our alg 
ApplicationMgr.DLLs += {"EbfWriter","OnboardFilter"};
ApplicationMgr.TopAlg += 
{
     "EbfWriter",
     "OnboardFilter"
};


// If running simulation - specify what source to use
// add the local specs to  the list of source library documents
/////FluxSvc.source_lib += {"$(EBFWRITERROOT)/src/test/test_sources.xml"};
FluxAlg.source_name="backgndmaxpdr";


// Number of events to process
ApplicationMgr.EvtMax = 100;

// Set output level threshold (2=DEBUG, 3=INFO, 4=WARNING, 5=ERROR, 6=FATAL )
MessageSvc.OutputLevel      =2;

//==============================================================
//
// End of job options file
//
